description:
Our place is close to all major subway lines and within walking distance to Soho, downtown, Union Square, Meatpacking district, etc. The area has a lot of nice cafes, shops, restaurants and bars. You’ll love our place because of the location and neighborhood feel. Great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
Two minute walk to West 4th metro (Blue line A,C, E, & orange line B, D, F, M trains) and Houston Street metro (red line, 1 train).

The apartment is comfortable and quiet. It has a large light-filled bedroom with a queen-sized bed. Well-equipped kitchen, lots of green plants and very clean.

A block away from West 4 Street Station and other major subway lines.
name: Lovely West Village 1 BR
